movie.title: The Garden
movie.description_intro: A nearly wordless visual narrative intercuts two main stories and a couple of minor ones. A woman, perhaps the Madonna, brings forth her baby to a crowd of intrusive paparazzi; she tries to flee them. Two men who are lovers marry and are arrested by the powers that be. The men are mocked and pilloried, tarred, feathered, and beaten. Loose in this contemporary world of electrical-power transmission lines is also Jesus. The elements, particularly fire and water, content with political power, which is intolerant and murderous.
movie.description_full: A nearly wordless visual narrative intercuts two main stories and a couple of minor ones. The men are mocked and pilloried, tarred, feathered, and beaten. Loose in this contemporary world of electrical-power transmission lines is also Jesus. The elements, particularly fire and water, content with political power, which is intolerant and murderous.

movies.title: A Portuguesa
movies.summary: In the north of Italy, and in complete conflict with the Episcopacy of Trent, Von Ketten searches for a wife. He goes to a distant country, Portugal, so as not to interfere with his political plans or add fuel to the fire of his existing conflicts.

movies.title: South Terminal
movies.summary: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.
movies.description_full: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.
movies.synopsis: In a country plunging into armed conflict, a doctor tries to do his duty against all odds, until the day his destiny is turned upside down.

movies.title: Dolly Parton's Christmas of Many Colors: Circle of Love
movies.title_english: Dolly Parton's Christmas of Many Colors: Circle of Love
movies.title_long: Dolly Parton's Christmas of Many Colors: Circle of Love (2016)
movies.summary: An unexpected blizzard threatens the Parton family, while at the same time Dolly's father (and his kids) make sacrifices to raise enough money to finally buy his wife the wedding ring he could never afford to give her. Meanwhile, an important person in little Dolly's life begins to see that her amazing voice and musical gift might just be made for something bigger than rural Tennessee.
movies.description_full: An unexpected blizzard threatens the Parton family, while at the same time Dolly's father (and his kids) make sacrifices to raise enough money to finally buy his wife the wedding ring he could never afford to give her. Meanwhile, an important person in little Dolly's life begins to see that her amazing voice and musical gift might just be made for something bigger than rural Tennessee.

movies.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
movies.summary: In a wintry small town, the body of a teenager named Jamie Marks is found by the river. Adam, the star of his cross-country team, becomes fascinated with Jamie-a boy nobody really knew or interacted with, except occasionally to bully him. When Jamie's ghost begins to appear both to Adam and Gracie, the classmate who discovered the body, Adam is caught between two worlds. He has a budding romance with Gracie, but he also feels a deep connection to Jamie, who brings him closer to the world of the undead.
